classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
A complete set of WSGI applications to serve files in a file system as music 
stream, as HTML pages or as WebDAV responses.
The files served can be encoded in any code page, including cp1252 and UTF-8.
A simple domain like authentication providing users and groups is included.
info.name: wsgifileserver
info.summary: WSGI music and WebDAV file server
info.html_description: A complete set of WSGI applications to serve files in a file system as music stream, as HTML pages or as WebDAV responses. The files served can be encoded in any code page, including cp1252 and UTF-8. A simple domain like authentication providing users and groups is included.
